record.description: [Paula Poindexter of Prairie View Texas, a ninth grader, was admitted to the University of Chicago under its Small School Talent Search. This program seeks out promising students in high schools within small communities and encourages them to apply for admission to a highly selective, large urban university such as Chicago.]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: See also Series I: Paula Poindexter, Informal and UC Magazine, Nov/Dec. 1968, pp.30-31.
